body:
This is a test note... I think all of my notes got deleted?


Things to Do:
- Add more features to the text editor: bullet points, fonts, html editing, etc
- Get the AutoSave feature working flawlessly
- Implement user settings features
- Test on Windows
- Allow users to change window colors
- Allow users to export document to pdf, text file, etc
- Allow for auto saving to Google Drive, or something else
- Figure out why I can't right click...
- Add some specific right clicking features maybe?
